pr_title: test: add test for setting global font

timeline.message:
test: add test for setting global font

Fixes #9409

timeline.bodyText:
You should always include at least one generic family name in a font-family list, since there's no guarantee that any given font is available. This lets the browser select an acceptable fallback font when necessary.

Maybe add  , monospace; so that in case the font name loading doesn't work, it would use that instead and fail the test
